text: Suggested algorithm for the management of pulmonary aspiration Assess patient up to 2 hours for evidence of new signs: * Cough or wheeze + Decreased oxygen saturation on room air « Alveolar arteral O, gradient >300 mmHg * New infiltrations on the OR One ormore new signs within 2 hours — admitto higher level of care (High Dependency Unit or Intensive Care Unit) No new infiktrates or signs — discharge to ward as planned.
